notion.aiResponding.description: Displayed when the AI is generating a response.

notion.browseCategory.description: Displayed when the user browsing template categories

notion.browsingTemplates.description: Displayed when the user browsing templates

notion.category.description: Displayed when the user viewing a category

notion.conversationStats.description: Displayed to show the number of times the user asked a question and total words used, e.g., 'asked 3 times | 150 words'.

notion.editAMeetingNote.description: Displayed when the user editing a meeting note

notion.editMeetingNote.description: Displayed when the user editing a specifig meeting note

notion.editingAPage.description: Displayed when the user editing a page

notion.editingPage.description: Displayed when the user editing a specific page

notion.readingAPage.description: Displayed when the user reading a page

notion.readingBlogs.description: Displayed when the user reading a blog

notion.readingCustomerReview.description: Displayed when the user reading customer reviews

notion.readingPage.description: Displayed when the user reading a specifig page

notion.searchingTemplate.description: Displayed when the user searching a template

notion.startNewConversation.description: Displayed when the user is starting a new conversation.

notion.talkingWithAI.description: Displayed when the user is engaging in a conversation with the AI.
notion.talkingWithAI.message: Talking with Notion AI about something

notion.template.description: Displayed when the user viewing a template

notion.thinkingOfPrompt.description: Displayed when the user is thinking of a new prompt.

notion.unknown.description: Displayed when the user viewing an unknown page/template/category

notion.viewDownloadsPage.description: Displayed when the user viewing a download page

notion.viewProductsPage.description: Displayed when the user viewing a product page

notion.viewPublicWebsite.description: Displayed when the user viewing a public Notion website

notion.viewUpcomingMeeting.description: Displayed when the user viewing their upcoming meetings
